sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import ThumbUpAltIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ThumbUpAlt' import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete' import MoreHorizonIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreHoriz' import moment from 'moment' import useStyles from './styles' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { deletePost, likePost } from '../../../actions/posts' function Post({ post, setCurrentId}) { const classes = useStyles(); const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{post.creator} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
{post.tags.map((tags) => `#${tags} `)}
{post.title} {post.message} ) } export default Post
